metadata.Title: CVE-2022-20452 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In initializeFromParcelLocked of BaseBundle.java, there is a possible method arbitrary code execution due to a confused deputy. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-13Android ID: A-240138318

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
